>>== RESULT ==>>

<<== RESULT ==<<

>>===== CSL =====>>
<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="note"
      version="1.0">
  <info>
    <id />
    <title />
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>
  <citation>
    <layout suffix="." delimiter="; ">
      <names variable="author">
        <name form="short"/>
        <institution institution-parts="short">
        </institution>
      </names>
    </layout>
  </citation>
</style>
